timeline.message: Feat(Java): Add previous field model as parameter for after save/update actions
Feat(Java): Implement ProviderAfterUpdateActionHelper to update configurations that are not cascaded
Fix(Java): Remove previous field model from beforeSaveAction because it makes no sense
Fix(Java): Get actual previous configurations rather than pre-save field models

timeline.bodyText: The name of beforeUpdateAction confused me here, can we change it to something like, beforeUpdateActionResult or something similar?
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.message: Refactor(Java): Rename variable representing a field model returned from a beforeUpdateAction
